pages.text: Grants the player Bad Omen V (5 minutes), Frost Resistance I (1 minute)$(br)After consumption, if the consumer has Bad Omen, illager faction mobs will remain neutral to the consumer (does not work on most illager boss mobs), and once the Bad Omen disappears, the effect expires until the next time this item is consumed (regardless of whether Bad Omen is obtained again during the period between effect expiration and next consumption, the effect cannot be activated again)
